lead_paragraph: The welterweight Oscar Diaz spent Wednesday night in surgery for bleeding on the brain and is in a coma after collapsing between rounds of a nationally televised bout in his hometown, San Antonio. The 25-year-old Diaz was taking a beating from Delvin Rodriguez at Municipal Auditorium when he collapsed on his stool entering the 11th round.
